Definition: In this task, you will be given a text and a title. The title is present in the text and refers to the entity in the text. The title might be slightly different from what is present in the text, but as long as it refers to the same entity, it is a correct title. Indicate your answer as "Yes" if the title is correct, otherwise indicate your answer as "No".

Positive Examples.input:
Text: The Mansfield Building Society is a UK building society which has its headquarters in Mansfield Nottinghamshire. It is a member of the Building Societies Association. 
Title: Mansfield Building Society
Positive Examples.explanation: The title "Mansfield Building Society" is present in the text and it is the main entity that is referred in the text. Hence, it is the title of the document.

Positive Examples.input:
Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll. 
Title: HMS Argyll (F231)
Positive Examples.explanation: "HMS Argyll" is present in the text and it is the main entity that is referred in the text. Here, the text in parentheses "F31" is not present in the document and it can be ignored. Hence, the output is correct.

Negative Examples.input:
Text: The Mansfield Building Society is a UK building society which has its headquarters in Mansfield Nottinghamshire. It is a member of the Building Societies Association. 
Title: Mansfield Building Society
Negative Examples.explanation: The title "Mansfield Building Society" is present in the text and it is the main entity that is referred in the text. Hence, the output is incorrect.

Negative Examples.input:
Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll. 
Title: HMS Argyll (F231)
Negative Examples.explanation: The output should be either "Yes" or "No". Hence, it is negative example.

Instances.input:
Text:  Queets Glacier is located in the Olympic Mountains in Olympic National Park in the U.S. state of Washington. Like all the glaciers in Olympic National Park Hanging Glacier is in a state of retreat. The glacier lies on the northwest side of Mount Queets at an elevation of about 5564 feet (1696 m) the glacier descends northwest bounded by two arêtes on either side. The ice reaches as low as 5000 ft (1500 m) before terminating and giving rise to some of the headwaters of the Queets River. 
Title: Queets Glacier

Text:  Sudai is a village in the Madhubani District in north Bihar India. It is a very prominent village in Mithila. Great names like Late Shri Pandit Jagannath Mishra who was a member of parliament of 5th Lok shabha (1971–1975) from cong(i) lived in Sudai. He was a headmaster by profession before becoming member of parliament in India. Sudai can be reached by train or by road. By train go from Jhanjharpur towards nirmali. Then you should get off at Chikna Halt to go to Sudai. 
Title: Goh Tat Chuan

Text:  Tajark (Persian: تجرك‎ also Romanized as Ţajark) is a village in Korond Rural District in the Central District of Boshruyeh County South Khorasan Province Iran. At the 2006 census its population was 44 in 10 families. 
Title: Tajark South Khorasan

Text:  The Philadelphia Daily News is a tabloid newspaper that serves Philadelphia Pennsylvania United States. The newspaper is owned by Interstate General Media which also owns Philadelphia's other major newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer.The Daily News began publishing on March 31 1925 under founding editor Lee Ellmaker. By 1930 the newspaper's circulation exceeded 200000 but by the 1950s the news paper was losing money. 
Title: Philadelphia Daily News

Text:  The Dini Cabinet was the 52nd cabinet of the Italian Republic and the second and last cabinet of the XII Legislature. It held office from 17 January 1995 to 17 May 1996 a total of 486 days or 1 year and 4 months. 
Title: The Magicians (Grossman novel)

Text:  The Ishëm River is a river in western Albania. It forms part of a watercourse (Tiranë-Gjole-Ishëm) that measures 79 km but only the lower third of the watercourse is known as the Ishëm. The Ishëm proper is formed at the confluence of the rivers Gjole and Zezë a few km northwest of Fushë-Krujë. It flows into the Adriatic Sea near the town Ishëm. 
Title: USS Guinevere (IX-67)

Text:  Russian River Brewing Company is a brewery and brewpub located in downtown Santa Rosa California. The company is well known for its strong India pale ales and sour beers. 
Title: Ervin Cseh

Text:  Zagaje Stradowskie [zaˈɡajɛ straˈdɔfskʲɛ] is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Czarnocin within Kazimierza County Świętokrzyskie Voivodeship in south-central Poland. It lies approximately 6 kilometres (4 mi) north-west of Czarnocin 13 km (8 mi) north of Kazimierza Wielka and 57 km (35 mi) south of the regional capital Kielce. 
Title: Zagaje Stradowskie
